Function reference

All functions

BANC
Provisional template brain object for BANC
BANC.surf
Simplified tissue surface of BANC
FANC.surf
Simplified tissue surface of FANC
banc_lr_position()
Predict whether a point is on the left or right of the BANC dataset
choose_fanc() choose_banc() with_fanc() with_banc()
Choose or (temporarily) use the FANC autosegmentation
dr_fanc()
Print information about your FANC setup including tokens and python modules
fanc4to3()
Convert XYZ locations between FANC4 (autoseg) and FANC3 (CATMAID)
fanc_cave_client() banc_cave_client()
Low level access to FANC's CAVE annotation infrastructure
fanc_cave_query() banc_cave_query()
Query FANC tables in the CAVE annotation system
fanc_cellid_from_segid() fanc_segid_from_cellid()
Convert between FANC cell ids and root ids
fanc_change_log()
Fetch change log information for one or more neurons
fanc_ids()
Return a vector of FANC root ids from diverse inputs
fanc_islatest()
Check if a FANC root id is up to date
fanc_latestid()
Find the latest id for a FANC root id
fanc_leaves()
Find the supervoxel identifiers of a FANC neuron
fanc_partner_summary() fanc_partners()
Summarise the connectivity of FANC neurons
fanc_read_l2dp() fanc_read_l2skel()
Read L2 skeleton or dotprops for FANC neurons using fafbseg-py
fanc_rootid()
Find the root identifier of a FANC neuron
fanc_scene()
Return a sample Neuroglancer scene URL for FANC dataset
fanc_set_token()
Set the token to be used to authenticate to FANC autosegmentation resources
fanc_voxdims() banc_voxdims() fanc_nm2raw() fanc_raw2nm() banc_raw2nm() banc_nm2raw()
Handle raw and nm calibrated FANC coordinates
fanc_xyz2id()
Convert xyz locations to root or supervoxel ids
mirror_banc()
Mirror points, neurons in BANC space
mirror_banc_lm
Provisional mirroring registration for BANC (lanmarks+thin plate splines)
read_fanc_meshes()
Read one or more FANC neuron meshes
transform_fanc2manc()
Transform FANC to MANC

Developed by Gregory Jefferis.
